thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Lujiazui Finance's Unit To Sell Stake In Industrial Unit For At Least 1.35 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Lujiazui Finance's Unit To Sell Stake In Industrial Unit For At Least 1.35 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: shanghai lujiazui finance & trade zone development co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Shanghai Lujiazui Finance & Trade Zone Development Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT PLANS TO SELL 50 PERCENT STAKE IN INDUSTRIAL UNIT FOR AT LEAST 1.35 BILLION YUAN ($207.06 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Dga2GG Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5200 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
